definitions.title: answer, response
definitions.body: ;—abs. [[־רַךְ]]´[[מ]] Pr 15:1 a gentle answer; cstr. [[מַעֲנִה פִּיו]] v:Pr 15:23, cf. [[לָשׁוֹן]] ´[[מ]] Pr 16:1 (i.e. ability to answer); [[אֱלֽהִים]] ´[[מ]] Mic 3:7 i.e. response for guidance; abs. also Pr 29:19 response = obedience; Job 32:3, Job 32:5 reply, refutation; sf. [[לַמַּעֲנֵהוּ]] Pr 16:4 = for its purpose, that for which it answers (v. Toy).
